item.title: Irys Completes $10 Million Series A Funding Round, Led by CoinFund
item.description: On August 21st, the programmable data blockchain Irys concluded a Series A funding round worth $10 million. CoinFund took the lead in this round, with Hypersphere, Tykhe Ventures, Varrock Ventures, Breed VC, Echo Group, Amber Group, and WAGMI Ventures also participating. This funding round has increased Irys' total funding to $20 million.

item.title: SOL Treasury Holding Reaches 400,909 Tokens
item.description: On August 21st, SOL Strategies tweeted that its treasury currently possesses 400,909 SOL. It earns SOL rewards on a daily basis through staking. Instead of diluting shareholder equity, it chooses to reinvest these rewards, thereby expanding the treasury at a cost lower than that of market purchase.

item.title: US Stock Market and Cryptocurrency Stocks Experience Downturn, SBET Drops by 3.98%
item.description: On August 21, when the US stock market opened, cryptocurrency stocks experienced a general decline. These included:Coinbase (COIN) decreased by 0.54%.Circle (CRCL) decreased by 2.75%.MicroStrategy (MSTR) decreased by 0.53%.Bullish (BLSH) decreased by 0.17%.Bitmine (BMNR) decreased by 3.28%.BTCS (BTCS) decreased by 2.96%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) decreased by 3.98%.

item.title: JPMorgan: Initial Jobless Claims Data Does Not Show Rapid Deterioration in Labor Market
item.description: August 21st - Thomas Simons, an economist at Jefferies, wrote in a report that the initial claims data did not suggest a rapid deterioration in the labor market. "The sideways fluctuations in both initial and continuing claims in recent months imply that layoff activities remain restricted. The 'no hiring/no firing' characteristic of the labor market continues to be firmly in effect." The most recent jobless claims data pertain to the reference week for the August nonfarm payroll report, which will be released in early September. Simons pointed out that since the reference week in July, initial claims have increased by 14,000, while the four-week moving average has decreased by approximately 5,000. (FXStreet)

item.title: OKB On-chain Price is currently at $319.21, with a 42% positive premium over the OKX platform.
item.description: On August 21st, based on market data, OKB briefly surged to above $400 on the Ethereum chain and then fell back. Currently, it is trading at $319.21, with a 24-hour increase of 140.54%. Compared to the price on the OKX platform, which is $224.58, there is currently a 42% premium.

item.title: US Stock Market Open, Nasdaq Down 0.3%
item.description: On August 21, while the US stock market was open, the Dow decreased by 0.29%, the S&P 500 dropped by 0.27%, and the Nasdaq declined by 0.3%.

item.title: X Layer's on-chain transaction volume has increased by 250% in the past 24 hours, reaching $68.2 million
item.description: On August 21st, based on geckoterminal data, within the past 24 hours, the on-chain transaction volume of X Layer reached $68.2 million, experiencing a 250% increase and having a transaction count of 34.75 thousand.The market capitalization of the Meme coin OKAY has reached $11.8 million, with a 24-hour price increase of 101%.BlockBeats reminds users that the price of the Meme coin is highly volatile. Please be cautious about asset protection and avoid the fear of missing out (FOMO).

item.title: Optimism is now collaborating with Flashbots to bring fast and verifiable transaction sorting to Superchain.
item.description: August 21st. Optimism declared that it is collaborating with Flashbots to introduce fast and verifiable transaction sorting to the Superchain.

item.title: Digital Asset Exchange Company LO:TECH Completes $5 Million Seed Round Funding, Led by 13books Capital
item.description: On August 21st, as reported by The Block, LO:TECH, a London-based digital asset exchange company, has successfully completed a $5 million seed round of financing. The lead investor is 13books Capital, with participation from Lightspeed Faction, Veris Ventures, CRIT Ventures USA, as well as angel investors Mark Ransford and Rodney Ngone. The company has indicated that this funding will be utilized to expand its on-chain capital market high-frequency trading business.

item.title: Analyst: Trump Policy Could Weaken Dollar's Cyclical Support
item.description: On August 21st, Jill Hirzel from Insight Investment declared in a report that the US dollar might weaken. This is because Trump's policies have diminished the allure of US exceptionalism and could result in a reduction of capital inflows into the US. Hirzel said, "Policy uncertainty and a more assertive 'America First' agenda may eat away at the cyclical support for the US dollar, causing it to enter a prolonged period of weakness." Nevertheless, she also noted that investors should be cautious when overly betting on the dollar's decline through short positions. This is because growth outside the US is expected to be at best lackluster, and speculators may already have significant short positions on the dollar. Additionally, before there are signs of economic weakness that are sufficient to worry policymakers, real interest rates adjusted for inflation may still remain high. (FXStreet)
